critique: The document expresses sadness and anger due to the murder of President Lincoln and the attempted assassination of other officers. There is also an element of fear and surprise due to the conspiracy. Disgust is present due to the heinous nature of the crimes. The intensity of sadness is high due to the death of the president. Anger is also high due to the nature of the crimes. Fear and surprise are moderate. The document is a formal order, so the emotions are somewhat subdued.
